description:
See setup blow. Enable AI agents to interact with Twitch streams by sending chat messages, managing polls and predictions, creating clips, analyzing chat activity, and moderating users. Automate stream title and category updates while leveraging intelligent user resolution and timeout duration suggestions for effective moderation. Simplify Twitch stream management and enhance viewer engagement through standardized AI tools.

Twitch MCP — Quick Setup Checklist

1. Generate token: https://twitchtokengenerator.com 

✅ Choose Custom Scope Token → scroll to bottom → select scopes (tip: “Select All,” then deselect any you don’t want). 

✅ Keep the tab open — you’ll need the Access Token and Client ID in step 3.

-------------------------------

2. Get (Twitch) Broadcaster ID: https://streamweasels.com/tools/convert-twitch-username-to-user-id/  

✅ Enter your Twitch username to get your numeric Broadcaster (Twitch) ID.  

✅ Keep the tab open for step 3.

-------------------------------

3. Configure Smithery: https://smithery.ai/server/@Eclipse-XV/twitch-mcp-smithery   

✅ In the right-hand box, paste in: Channel Name → Client ID → Access (Auth) Token → Broadcaster ID

-------------------------------

4. Install & Setup Cursor (free Desktop plan): https://cursor.com/home?from=agents   

✅ In Cursor, set Agent Mode = Auto (right panel). You'll want to click the Agent Dropdown and edit model choice to Auto. (Optional) Turn on Auto-Run Mode to skip per-request approvals. 

✅ On Smithery, click One-click Add to Cursor → Approve.  

-------------------------------

5. Test by sending messages or creating polls.

✅ Actions run as your broadcaster account — keep your token private. If compromised or unsure, regenerate the token.

twitchChannel.description: Twitch channel name for chat monitoring

twitchClientId.description: Twitch Client ID for API access

capabilities.name: sendMessageToChat
capabilities.description: Send message to the Twitch Chat

capabilities.name: createTwitchClip
capabilities.description: Create a Twitch clip of the current stream

capabilities.name: analyzeChat
capabilities.description: Analyze recent Twitch chat messages and provide a summary of topics and activity

capabilities.name: getRecentChatLog
capabilities.description: Get the last 20 chat messages for moderation context

capabilities.name: timeoutUser
capabilities.description: Timeout a user in the Twitch chat. If no username is provided, it will return the recent chat log for LLM review.

capabilities.name: banUser
capabilities.description: Ban a user from the Twitch chat. If no username is provided, it will return the recent chat log for LLM review.

capabilities.name: updateStreamCategory
capabilities.description: Update the game category of the stream
